name: Emoji-Connect
storyline: The plot is simply. Mix emojis to get them bigger and repeat it as many times as you can before the time runs out.
summary: The aim of the game is to score as many points as possible by mixing emojis of the same type before time runs out. When two emojis are combined, you get time. The bigger the combination, the more time you get. This way, the best players can extend the game indefinitely.
